transcript: Yes, I am like go over your cruel feet and I hate and loathe you think I'd realize what you really are before I would ever ever marry you again I would never marry you again. I'd rather die and torment

segments.text: Yes, I am like go over your cruel feet and I hate and loathe you think I'd realize what you really are before I would ever ever marry you again
I would never marry you again. I'd rather die and torment

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Yes, I am. Let go of me you're cruel fiend and I hate and loathe you. Thank God I realized who you really are before I would ever, ever marry you again. I would never marry you again. I'd rather die in torment.
